description: Those who thrive where others perish. Hunters, scouts, and trackers who endure the wilds through instinct, adaptation, and relentless focus.

talents.name: Hunter
talents.description: You read the rhythm of your prey, no movement, scent, or sound escapes your notice.

ranks.1: Choose two creature types as your primary prey. You deal +1d6 damage when striking your chosen prey.
ranks.3: Gain advantage on Perception and Survival checks to track or detect your prey. +1 to attack rolls against prey.
ranks.5: Choose a third creature type as prey. You can sense your prey within 60 ft (general direction only).
ranks.6: Damage against prey increases to +4d6. Your prey cannot hide from you within 30 ft.
ranks.7: Gain +2 to Defense when fighting your prey.
ranks.8: Damage against prey increases to +5d6. First attack each turn against prey has advantage.
ranks.9: Choose a fourth creature type. You can sense all prey creatures within 120 ft.
ranks.10: Ultimate Hunter: Damage against prey increases to +6d6. Once per long rest, mark a creature (any type) as prey for 24 hours. All your attacks against that creature have advantage and deal maximum damage on the first hit.

talents.name: Adapt Explorer
talents.description: Your body and instincts adjust to any terrain or element, thriving where others struggle.

ranks.1: Ignore difficult terrain and gain advantage on Survival checks.
ranks.2: Gain resistance to environmental damage (heat, cold, acid, or similar natural hazards).
ranks.3: Once per day, for 1 hour, you and allies within 30 ft gain the benefits of Ranks 1 and 2.

talents.name: Agile Protector
talents.description: You use motion as defense, weaving between strikes and protecting allies through movement.

ranks.1: When missed by a melee attack, you may move up to 10 ft without provoking opportunity attacks.
ranks.2: As a Reaction, you may impose disadvantage on a melee attack targeting an ally if their attacker is within 5 ft of you.
ranks.3: Once per short rest, when an ally within 10 ft is hit, you may take the damage instead and move both yourself and the ally up to 10 ft.

talents.name: Beast Bond
talents.description: You forge a connection with beasts through shared instinct and trust.

ranks.1: You can calm or command beasts with a successful Wisdom (Taming) check.
ranks.2: You gain a loyal beast companion (CR â‰¤ half your level) that obeys simple verbal or mental commands.
ranks.3: Your companion's attacks count as magical. It gains HP equal to your level and +2 to all saves. You can communicate telepathically within 1 mile.

talents.name: Defensive Footwork
talents.description: Balanced footing and precision guard you where armor cannot.

ranks.1: When you take the Dodge action, add your AGL modifier to your Defense again until the start of your next turn.
ranks.2: Once per short rest, you may use Dodge as a Bonus Action instead of a full action.
ranks.3: When using Dodge, gain +2 to all saving throws. Enemies have disadvantage on opportunity attacks against you.

talents.name: Tracker's Instinct
talents.description: You sense trails, deception, and danger even when sight and sound fail.

ranks.1: Gain advantage on Perception and Insight checks, you are now trained in them.
ranks.2: Once per short rest, you may detect hidden creatures within 10 ft even if they are hidden by magic.
ranks.3: Once per short rest, instantly identify the direction and approximate distance of a creature you have tracked before.

talents.name: Wilderness Adaptation
talents.description: Your senses and instincts evolve to thrive in harsh and unpredictable environments.

ranks.1: Gain advantage on Survival checks to detect natural hazards such as quicksand, unstable ground, poisonous plants, or weak ice.
ranks.2: Gain resistance to natural poisons and venoms; on a successful save against poison, take no damage.
ranks.3: You and allies within 10 ft cannot become lost except by magical means. Gain advantage on all saves against environmental effects.

talents.name: Master of Survival
talents.description: You have become one with the natural order, a predator, guardian, and force of balance.

ranks.1: You cannot be tracked by nonmagical means. Automatically detect ambushes and traps within 20 ft. Once per short rest, when you or an ally within 15 ft fails a saving throw, force a reroll. Once per long rest, if you or your beast companion would be reduced to 0 LP, you both instead regain all LP and 1 HP instead. Your movement cannot be reduced by terrain, weather, or restraints smaller than your size category.
